lyric: Say my name when a tree susurrates
translation: 当花叶呢喃之时，请呼唤我的名字

lyric: Once and again telling a story lost in time
translation: 由此开启那飘零于时间里的故事

lyric: the way it starts and the way it ends
Never again making up stories in dismay
translation: 不再自绝望中编织传说

lyric: With several starts, but just one end
translation: 分叉的起点，终将在结局交汇

lyric: Ah, how I long to embrace
The future breaking out of shades from the past
translation: 那从往世荫蔽中破土的未来

lyric: 母带制作 Mastering Engineer：宫奇Gon(HOYO-MiX)
